Text: Man Nepotu you are 3rd to God and Jesus, Goltv canada is not showing la liga so ive been goin on frontrowsports.ru and livetv.ru/en to catch barca games. I've been religiously watching every single barca match in all competition. Thank you for sharing your torrents, your work is much apreciated.

@BarcaForca: I'm happy to hear that. Here you can watch all those games because I've labeled each Barca's game, in every competition, every year. You're welcome, bro!
@BayFarm10: You're welcome, like always, bro!
Thank you Nepotu.  Thanks to BeinUSA Sports and their lack of a Canadian outlet, I am out of luck without your excellent uploads.  I miss Ray but I don't miss Phil.
